name: Ghosts (Sasha_Foxtrot)
description:
Blue, a student of Brown, has been hired by White to spy on Black from the window of a room on Orange Street. 

A partial adaption of Paul Auster's postmodern detective thriller, this visual novel explores the disintegration of space and mind... and the uncanny double of watching and being watched. 

If you're interested in my thought process, check out  https://sashafoxtrot.medium.com/ghosts-d5b712eb044 .

Credit to Jose Guizar for window illustration (http://windowsofnewyork.com/#top )
